title: Look at converting some social homes in city-centre flats into cost-rentals, says Taoiseach’s group
content: No decision has been made on whether that will happen, a Dublin City Council spokesperson has said. But it hasn’t been ruled out.

title: RTB tribunal finds Tramco renters are licencees not tenants, overturning a previous decision
content: The landlord argued that the renters in the Rathmines building were hotel guests and that they didn’t have exclusive occupation.

title: Office of Public Works starts ball rolling on GPO redevelopment
content: It has issued a tender for a feasibility study. The documents include few details, but they do confirm the likely future uses for the historic building.

title: Trump says he’s deploying National Guard in Washington DC to tackle crime and homelessness
content: US President Donald Trump said Monday he’s placing the Washington, D.C., police department under federal control and deploying the National Guard to make the nation’s capital safer.

title: Mortgage lenders ‘banking on people’s apathy’ as they charge sky-high interest rates
content: Mortgage lenders have been accused of banking on people’s apathy to get away with charging them sky-high interest rates.

title: Protestant fraternity ‘unreservedly apologise’ after pictures of members urinating near homes circulate online
content: The Apprentice Boys of Derry have issued an apology after an image surfaced of what appears to be members of the group urinating near homes in the city during a parade on Saturday.

title: Irish authorities tackle 52 cases of international child abduction by parents
content: Most children taken from Ireland are brought elsewhere in Europe

title: Carrigaline fire damages homes as councillor condemns onlookers filming blaze for social media
content: Firefighters battled strong winds to contain the blaze, while concerns grow over spectators arriving to take photos and videos

title: Apprentice Boys apologise after some members urinate near homes during 'Relief of Derry' events
content: The General Secretary of the Apprentice Boys labelled the incident “disgusting” and “unacceptable”.

title: Trump says that homeless people need to be moved 'far' from Washington 'immediately'
content: Trump has threatened to federalise the city and give the White House the final say in how it is run.
